mapper.insert: insert into cse.hobby (Description, Name, Type, HobbyModel) VALUES (#{Description}, #{Name}, #{Type}, #{HobbyModel})
mapper.select: select * from hobby where Hid in (select user_hobby.Hid from user_hobby where Uid = #{Uid} and degree = #{degree});
mapper.update: update user_hobby set degree = #{degree} where Hid = #{Hid} and Uid = #{Uid};
